SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc27
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.ClientClass

Interface ClientManuscript

All Known Implementing Classes:
Manuscript
public interface ClientManuscript
The ClientManuscript interface provides methods for accessing and manipulating manuscript data, including counters of any Corner Symbol, placements, the manuscript field and the vertical and horizontal maximum extension of the manuscript

    • satisfiedRequirement

      boolean satisfiedRequirement(ResourceCard card)
      Checks if the given ResourceCard or GoldCard (subclass of ResourceCard GoldCard) satisfies the requirements.
      Parameters:
      card - the ResourceCard/GoldCard to check
      Returns:
      true if the requirements are satisfied, false otherwise.

    • getPlacements

      ArrayList<Placement> getPlacements()
      Gets the list of valid placements in the manuscript.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Placement objects representing the placements.

    • isValidPlacement

      Checks if the placement at the specified coordinates is valid
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the placement
      y - the y-coordinate of the placement
      Returns:
      true if the placement is valid, false otherwise
